level.description: true: => do level on 15% - 85% (under 15 % will be black above 85% will be white), false: => 0% - 100%, <number>: => (0 + <number>)% - (100 - number)%

auto_level.description: If no level specified, do auto level

min_level.description: Min level if no level end no auto-level

max_level.description: Max level if no level end no auto-level

margin_horizontal.description: The horizontal margin used on auto-detect content [mm]

margin_vertical.description: The vertical margin used on auto-detect content [mm]

dpi.description: The DPI used to convert the mm to pixel

tesseract.description: Use tesseract to to an OCR on the document

min_box_size_crop.description: The minimum box size to find the content on witch one we will crop [mm]

min_box_size_limit.description: The minimum box size to find the limits based on content [mm]

min_box_size_empty.description: The minimum box size to find the content to determine if the page is empty [mm]

min_box_black_crop.description: The minimum black in a box on content find on witch one we will crop [%]

min_box_black_limit.description: The minimum black in a box on content find the limits based on content [%]

min_box_black_empty.description: The minimum black in a box on content find to determine if the page is empty [%]

box_kernel_size.description: The block size used in a box on content find [mm]

box_block_size.description: The block size used in a box on threshold for content find [mm]

box_threshold_value_c.description: A variable used on threshold, should be low on low contrast image, used in a box on content find

scan_folder.description: This should be shared with the process container in 'source'.

viewer.description: The command used to start the viewer
